channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cadence Built A Nvidia DGX SuperPOD Digital Twin With Incredible Scale And Accuracy
item.description: Cadence developed a digital twin of Nvidia’s DGX SuperPOD with DGX GB200 Blackwell-based systems that can scale to gigawatt levels, but with chip-leve...

item.title: Is There Enough Carbon Storage To Solve Climate Change?
item.description: New research shows global CO₂ storage is less than previously anticipated. The real issue isn’t geology but speed—can we build storage fast enough to ...

item.title: AJ Lee WWE Raw Quickly Dethrones ‘Wednesday’ On Netflix’s Top 10 List
item.description: Wednesday was not strong enough to hold off the first appearance of the returned AJ Lee on WWE Monday Night RAW

item.title: Football Events Under Threat From Heat And Climate Risks, Study Finds
item.description: The study warns escalating climate risks could impact events like the 2026 FIFA World Cup, which is due to be held in North America.

item.title: ‘Hollow Knight’—Here’s The Lore To Know Before Playing ‘Silksong’
item.description: Silksong, the sequel to the smash hit Hollow Knight, starts off where the first game left off—here’s the lore to know before playing the game.
